item.title: Edgerouter X -- DNS issues
item.description: #1 plug laptop into eth0 #2 Edgerouter X defaults to 192.168.1.1 as did the TG589vac, but that doesn’t matter as it is now just a modem #3 get on same net segment… statically configure laptop to IP 192.168.1.42 (‘cause Douglas Adams, obvs) NM 255.255.255.0 DG 192.168.1.1 #4 Browser to 192.168.1.1, default login usr and pswd: ‘ubnt’ / ‘ubnt’ Dice! OOH WHAT A PRETTY INTERFACE. Kinda overwhelming actually. Enable SSH, enable DNS forwarding on all interfaces.
